original_title: Agreement reached for cable car project in Ambuluwawa
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Board of Investment of Sri Lanka said an agreement has been reached for a cable car project at the Ambuluwawa Biodiversity Complex.
The Board said the 4.5 million US dollar agreement was reached with a private company in Sri Lanka.
The Board added that the cable car project will be implemented for a distance of 1.5km.
The BOI said the project will be completed within two years, with the technical support of a Chinese company.
